page.title: 06CARNON DOWNS
page.content: In Carnon Downs there are three shops including a Post Office. The others are Vivo, which sells mostly food, and Butlers, which is a kind of DIY shop which also sells shoes. There is also a telephone exchange - Telecom - next to Vivo. There is a Bronze Age burial mound in Parc-an-Creeg. There is a caravan park called Ring- well which has a big swimming pool open to the public. There are also two lots of granny flats and by them are some council houses. The Garden Centre includes a pet shop and cafe. The Playing Field has 3 swings plus a baby one and there is also a slide. There are plans for a Carnon Downs By- Pass which will cut the village in two and is proving controversial.
